name: Hotel Leonardo Prague

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: For my 50ty bday, we took this Hotel with my wife, and i must say that this a wonderful memory. Very good location in the old Prague near the Charles Bridge and the famous clock. The restaurant was very good (chief very well known). And, surprise, for my bday, they offered us in the room a bottle of champagne with a greeting card. Amazing. What else ?
reviews.title: Excellent

reviews.text: This hotel has the best possible location. Breakfast was really great. We were surprised by the choice of it. Staff was very friendly and helpful. Room was clean and tidy. We are returning to the hotel next month to stay there again.
reviews.title: Lovely hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My Partner and I stayed at Leonardo this March ('13). It is in an ideal location just minutes walk from the Old Town and the Charles Bridge.
reviews.title: Perfect Location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is clean with great sized rooms, the staff are helpful with good knowledge of the city. We particularly enjoyed the view of the Castle from our room and the quirky cellar location for our Breakfast in the mornings.
reviews.title: wonderful location, amazing staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We found that most of the recommended attractions/sites, restaurants and pubs found on Tripadvisor and Lonely planet were in short walking distance from the hotel.
reviews.title: Fantastic boutique hotel!!

reviews.text: Just returning from three nights at the Hotel Leonardo Prague. The hotel is built up in in a historical building, so room sizes and layouts differ. Ours was very roomy facing the inside courtyard and very quiet (no street noise) Room 259. FREE WIFI all over the hotel is much appreciated as was breakfast each morning. Breakfast was varied and delish. And the service manager was always there to insure that nothing ran out and that everyone's needs were met. I appreciated his diligence. We did eat dinner in the restaurant one evening and that was good too. The Hotel is a short walk from the Charles Bridge and all of the Old City. There are many pubs, restaurants and even a raging nite club nearby.
reviews.title: Old World Charm - New World Amenities

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The downside. The bath towels are very small and very thin. There were two of us is the room - and we did have to call for extra towels (easily received) each nite. The lotions and potions are screwed into the sink and shower walls in large pump versions. This is probably a great savings for the hotel, but awkward to use. Also there is no hair conditioner. I had "words" with the waiter at dinner. He wanted cash for a glass of wine instead of my signing for it. And when he did bring me the check he sternly told me to "put my correct room number on the check". I did not order a second glass of wine. When I mentioned it to the front desk when paying I was told yes, he had heard about the incident, but the facts were inconclusive. Translation...no apology.
reviews.title: “Excellent hotel”

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I was part of a group, and the Leonardo was chosen for us. Would I go back on my own? Unsure. It looks like their are lots of options to choose from in Prague. This is one of the many. Not a bad selection, but one of many.
reviews.title: Wonderful stay in Prague

reviews.text: We stayed at the Leonardo for 2 nights. It is a beautiful hotel located right in the city centre of Prague.
reviews.title: Beautiful room, great location and fantastic staff

reviews.text: When we arrived we were greeted by the driver from the hotel transport service. Driver Miroslav was very friendly and helpful and his gleaming Audi A6 made us feel like we had VIP treatment. He also took us back to the airport and made the whole transfer experience a real pleasure.
reviews.title: Leonardo has a wonderful charm, lacking consistent connectivity

reviews.text: Amazed by the look and feel of the place, the staff are really friendly and nothing seems any trouble .... The food and service was excellent.
reviews.title: Great, great, great...... A must for all travellers to Prague

reviews.text: Location spot on and wold highly recommend their airport transfer service, great value for money and as it was our 1st time in Prague a great start to the holiday.......

reviews.text: Free wifi, and it works good.
reviews.title: the best Breakfast!

reviews.text: was only in Prague for 3 days on business trip in this small nice hotel Leonardo . The rooms are very clean, comfortable, a nice change from the other big hotels. The bed is comfortable . The location of the hotel is also very good - just below the castle/Hradcany district, a couple of hundred metres from the Charles bridge. I was very pleasantly surprised by the hotel car service that they provide. Very reasonable price, quality service and the driver was very nice and professional. On an hour round trip he showed me a lot of history and recommended an excellent restaurant, traditional Czech food and beer - really amazing and informative. Staff very friendly and helpful, beautiful hotel, clean and comfortable.
reviews.title: Excellent service

reviews.text: The hotel is well situated near the old town and the jew quarter. The room was nice and clean and not too small. The breakfast was wonderful. The hotel was beautiful in and out. The staff was very helpfull also. The only negative aspect was one waiter at the restaurant but otherwise everything wass perfect. We recommend this hotel and will stay there again if we visti Prague again.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel at a great location

description: The boutique Hotel Leonardo is an oasis of elegance and sophisticated hospitality located directly in the Old Town, only 300m from the famous Charles Bridge. Hotel Leonardo enjoys a very unique central and quiet location and offers 82 richly and tastefully furnished rooms, magical outside fountain courtyard, Platina Restaurant & Garden, intimate meeting rooms and complimentary rich buffet breakfast and free Wi-Fi to all guests.
